QuestData.Title: A Not-So-Charmed Life
QuestData.Description: The furbolg covet that which does not belong to them.$B$B<Hephaestus turns the charm over in his hand and then discards it.>$B$BThere's a property to the carving that slowly corrupts those that aren't trolls. As I understand it, the furbolg have done this sort of thing before. Some never learn.$B$BNo doubt they hoard most of the charms in Thistlefur Hold above their village to the north.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you think that you retrieved all of the troll charms from Thistlefur Hold?$B$BIf any are left behind, the Thistlefur tribe will continue to be influenced by them, and eventually they will attack this place.
QuestData.RewardText: <Hephaestus nods slowly as he looks you straight in the eye.>$B$BYou've likely saved the Thistlefur from themselves, at least in the short run. If they can keep from stealing objects of power that don't belong to them, that is.$B$BI understand that the night elves are having problems with the other furbolg tribe to the south. That's something that Raene is going to want to speak to you about.$B$BHowever, there are more immediate concerns that I would ask for your help with.
